streams



StreamType

type: C enum
STREAM_INPUT_FILE
STREAM_INPUT_MEMORY
STREAM_OUTPUT_FILE
STREAM_OUTPUT_MEMORY
STREAM_COUNT

FileStream

typedef struct {
  FILE     *handle;
  PathArray path;
} FileStream;
type: C struct

MemoryStream

typedef struct {
  byte_array *bytes;
  size_t      offset;
} MemoryStream;
type: C struct

Stream

typedef struct {
  StreamType type;
  union Data
  {
    FileStream   file;
    MemoryStream memory;
  } data;
} Stream;
type: C struct

c_istream_open_file

bool  c_istream_open_file(Stream *stream, const char *path);
type: C function

bool  c_istream_open_memory(Stream *stream, byte_array *bytes);
type: C function

type: C function

bool  c_istream_read(Stream *stream, size_t size, uint8 *buffer);
type: C function

uint8 c_istream_read_byte(Stream *stream);
type: C function
